DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish effect ET blockade acute exercise induce blood flow endothelial function subject T2DM . DOC.brief_title: ET-blockade Exercise Induced Blood Flow T2DM
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( > 2 year since diagnosis ) OR control < 40 year age > 65 year age smoking cardiovascular disease diabetes related manifest vascular complication Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus use Glibenclamide use HIV drug use calcineurin inhibitor use drug interfere CYP3A4 CYP2C19
